entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enhanced navigation is not triggered by links in interactive components #49614
  • Preservation of attributes and elements in "Enhanced navigation" #49613
  • StreamRendering and RenderModeServer causes OnInitialized to be invoked twice. Second time query parameter not bound. #49612
  • Custom claims lost after sometime in AspNetCore Identity cookie #49610
  • Add ability to generate PIN instead of long tokens when trying to generate confirm email token or change password token. #49607
  • Browser error that ASP.NET Core dev certificate is not trusted if browser was already open when trust was established #49606
  • SpaProxyMiddleware: Allow custom SPA Loading Page #49605
  • A Suggestion for JSON Localization in Blazor #49603
    Backlog
  • Attributes RequestSizeLimit and DisableRequestSizeLimit not working when using Authentication #49594

Closed

  • Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.HtmlString implement System.Web.IHtmlString #48037
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Move aspnetcore to leverage JsonWebToken and JsonWebTokenHandler #49469
    8.0-preview7
  • Version range for IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt breaks offline source-build #49596

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix text field generator with explicit value. #49608
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Make DataProtectionKey props virtual #49604
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution

Merged

  • Make authorization policy caching work #49593
    area-security, 8.0-rc1
  • [hotreload] Change file encode #49247
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23374.2 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2228492 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, area-runtime, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution
